# Getting Started## RequirementsTerra SDK requires Python v3.7+.## Installation**NOTE:** _All code starting with a `$` is meant to run on your terminal (a bash prompt). All code starting with a `>>>` is meant to run in a python interpreter, like ipython._Terra SDK can be installed (preferably in a `virtual environment` from PyPI using `pip`) as follows:```$ pip install -U glitter_sdk```_You might have `pip3` installed instead of `pip`; proceed according to your own setup._‚ùó If you want to communicate with Terra Classic, use terra-sdk==2.x## DependenciesTerra SDK uses Poetry to manage dependencies. To get set up with all the required dependencies, run:```$ pip install poetry$ poetry install```## Tests## Code Quality
